function.name: ventStrength_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the ventilation intensity of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the ventilation intensity.

predefinedVentStrength.description: The predefined strength to set for the ventilation (e.g., automatic, high, low, normal, turbo, weak).
